title: Mini-Ep 86: The Kids Are All Right
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 86: The Kids Are All Right
itunes:subtitle: Listeners respond to questions about seasonal affective disorder, what to do when your boss calls you a pushover, and whether to go to grad school far away from your parents. Plus, we hear from perhaps our youngest listener yet, and hear a request to e...
description:
Listeners respond to questions about seasonal affective disorder, what to do when your boss calls you a pushover, and whether to go to grad school far away from your parents. Plus, we hear from perhaps our youngest listener yet, and hear a request to eliminate the word “purge” from our podcast vocabulary. 


To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Fabletics. Sign up for a VIP membership and get 2 leggings for only $24 by going to Fabletics.com/forever35. 
  • Beauty Pie. To get your first month free, visit BEAUTYPIE.COM today and use code Forever35.
  • Bombas. For 20% off any purchase during the big holiday sale through December 5th, visit bombas.com/forever35.
  • Stamps.com. Visit Stamps.com and use promo code F35 for a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale.
  • Native. For 20% off your first purchase just visit nativedeodorant.com and use promo code FOREVER35 at checkout.
  • Proven Skincare. Go to www.provenskincare.com/FOREVER35 and use promo code FOREVER 35 to get your exclusive 10% off.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
